sentences.en: He clawed insatiably at the traditional precepts.
sentences.cn: 他永不自足地死守传统规矩.

sentences.en: He was insatiably avaricious the more he got , the more he wanted to have.
The trucks were still filing past, the people still insatiably gaping.
sentences.cn: 卡车依然过个没完, 人们依然贪婪地傻看.

sentences.en: Their parents described them as being insatiably curious and as having superb memories.
sentences.cn: 他们的父母描述他们具有永不满足的好奇感和超常的记忆力.

words.tran_cn: 贪得无厌地；无法满足地
